languages.text: {n}Судя по всему, ксенос пытается спасти провидцев и их камни душ по чьей-то указке для ведомых лишь ему одному целей. Вам остается лишь догадываться, был ли поручивший Арлекину эту миссию "извечной шутки смех" живым существом, философским принципом или порождением его больного разума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Судя по всему, ксенос пытается спасти провидцев и их камни душ по чьей-то указке для ведомых лишь ему одному целей. Вам остается лишь догадываться, был ли поручивший Арлекину эту миссию "извечной шутки смех" живым существом, философским принципом или порождением его больного разума.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It seems the xenos is trying to save the Farseers and their spirit stones at the behest of another, whose reasons are known only to them. All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Судя по всему, ксенос пытается спасти провидцев и их камни душ по чьей-то указке для ведомых лишь ему одному целей. Вам остается лишь догадываться, был ли поручивший Арлекину эту миссию "извечной шутки смех" живым существом, философским принципом или порождением его больного разума.{/n}

All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}看起来，这个异形是在另一个人的授意之下，试图拯救这位先知的生命与灵魂石，这么做的原因恐怕只有他们自己知道。至于丑角做这件事情的动机，你猜测可能是某种生物下了命令，可能是出于某种哲学理念，也可能这一切只是他疯狂头脑中的臆想。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the xenos is trying to save the Farseers and their spirit stones at the behest of another, whose reasons are known only to them. All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看起来，这个异形是在另一个人的授意之下，试图拯救这位先知的生命与灵魂石，这么做的原因恐怕只有他们自己知道。至于丑角做这件事情的动机，你猜测可能是某种生物下了命令，可能是出于某种哲学理念，也可能这一切只是他疯狂头脑中的臆想。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parece que el xenos intenta salvar a los videntes y sus joyas espirituales a petición de una tercera parte por motivos que desconoces. Solo te queda preguntarte si la «risa de bromas sin fin» que dio su misión a este Arlequín es una criatura real, un principio filosófico o un producto de su imaginación demente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the xenos is trying to save the Farseers and their spirit stones at the behest of another, whose reasons are known only to them. All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece que el xenos intenta salvar a los videntes y sus joyas espirituales a petición de una tercera parte por motivos que desconoces. Solo te queda preguntarte si la «risa de bromas sin fin» que dio su misión a este Arlequín es una criatura real, un principio filosófico o un producto de su imaginación demente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この異種族は何者かの命令で先見司たちと彼らの魂縛石を救おうとしているらしい。ハーレクィンにこの任務を与えた「終わりなき戯れの笑い」というものが生き物なのか、哲学的な原理なのか、それとも彼の錯乱した心の産物なのか、推測しなければならない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the xenos is trying to save the Farseers and their spirit stones at the behest of another, whose reasons are known only to them. All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この異種族は何者かの命令で先見司たちと彼らの魂縛石を救おうとしているらしい。ハーレクィンにこの任務を与えた「終わりなき戯れの笑い」というものが生き物なのか、哲学的な原理なのか、それとも彼の錯乱した心の産物なのか、推測しなければならない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos versucht offenbar auf Geheiß eines anderen, die Runenpropheten und ihre Seelensteine zu retten. Warum, das weiß nur der mysteriöse Auftraggeber. Du musst nun nur noch erraten, ob "des ew'gen Scherzes Lachen", das dem Harlekin diesen Auftrag gegeben hat, ein Lebewesen ist, ein philosophischer Grundsatz oder ein Gespinst, das seinem wahnsinnigen Verstand entsprungen ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the xenos is trying to save the Farseers and their spirit stones at the behest of another, whose reasons are known only to them. All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos versucht offenbar auf Geheiß eines anderen, die Runenpropheten und ihre Seelensteine zu retten. Warum, das weiß nur der mysteriöse Auftraggeber. Du musst nun nur noch erraten, ob "des ew'gen Scherzes Lachen", das dem Harlekin diesen Auftrag gegeben hat, ein Lebewesen ist, ein philosophischer Grundsatz oder ein Gespinst, das seinem wahnsinnigen Verstand entsprungen ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le xénos semble vouloir sauver les Grands Prophètes et leurs pierres-esprits pour le compte de quelqu'un, et lui seul sait pourquoi. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à comprendre si ce "rire éternel" qui a chargé l'Arlequin de sa mission est une créature vivante, un principe philosophique ou le fruit de son esprit dérangé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the xenos is trying to save the Farseers and their spirit stones at the behest of another, whose reasons are known only to them. All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos semble vouloir sauver les Grands Prophètes et leurs pierres-esprits pour le compte de quelqu'un, et lui seul sait pourquoi. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à comprendre si ce "rire éternel" qui a chargé l'arlequin de sa mission est une créature vivante, un principe philosophique ou le fruit de son esprit dérangé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Görünüşe göre bu zeno, Ötesezenlerle ruh taşlarını bir başkası emrettiği için kurtarmaya çalışıyor. Kurtarılma sebeplerini ise bir tek hizmet ettiği kişi biliyor. Peki Arleken'e bu vazifeyi yükleyen, "sonu gelmez cümbüşün kahkahası"; canlı bir yaratık veya felsefi bir ilke mi yoksa akli dengesi yerinde olmayan Arleken'in uydurduğu bir şey mi? Buna karar vermek sana kalmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems the xenos is trying to save the Farseers and their spirit stones at the behest of another, whose reasons are known only to them. All you have to guess now is if the "laugh of jest unending" that gave the Harlequin this mission is a living creature, a philosophical principle, or the figment of his deranged mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Görünüşe göre bu zeno, Ötesezenlerle ruh taşlarını bir başkası emrettiği için kurtarmaya çalışıyor ama bunun sebebini ancak hizmet ettiği kişi biliyor. Peki Arleken'e bu vazifeyi yükleyen "sonu gelmez cümbüşün kahkahası"; canlı bir yaratık mı, felsefi bir ilke mi, yoksa akli dengesi yerinde olmayan Arleken'in uydurması mı? Buna karar vermek sana kalmış.{/n}
